description: Neural network verifier using bound propagation and branch-and-bound (VNN-COMP winner)

solutions.code:
conda create -n alpha-beta-crown python=3.9
conda activate alpha-beta-crown
conda install pytorch torchvision pytorch-cuda=11.8 -c pytorch -c nvidia
pip install auto_LiRPA

git clone https://github.com/Verified-Intelligence/alpha-beta-CROWN.git
cd alpha-beta-CROWN/complete_verifier
pip install -r requirements.txt

# Set device to CPU in config:
device: cpu

errors.cause: Invalid YAML config or missing parameters

solutions.code:
# Start from example:
cp configs/cifar_cnn_a_adv.yaml my_config.yaml
# Then modify

model:
  name: your_model
  path: path/to/model.onnx
specification:
  epsilon: 0.03
  norm: inf
python -c "import yaml; yaml.safe_load(open('config.yaml'))"

errors.cause: ONNX model format or operator issue

solutions.code:
import onnx
model = onnx.load('model.onnx')
print(model.opset_import)

# Use onnx-simplifier
pip install onnx-simplifier
python -m onnxsim model.onnx model_simplified.onnx
torch.onnx.export(model, x, 'model.onnx', opset_version=12)

; VNNLIB format example:
(declare-const X_0 Real)
(declare-const Y_0 Real)
(assert (<= X_0 1.0))
(assert (>= X_0 0.0))
(assert (>= Y_0 0.0))  ; Output >= 0

specification:
  type: Lp
  epsilon: 0.03
  norm: inf
  # Or use VNNLIB:
  vnnlib: property.vnnlib
# Use vnnlib generator script from alpha-beta-CROWN repo

solver:
  timeout: 300  # seconds
  batch_size: 64  # increase for GPU

solver:
  alpha-crown:
    enable: true
  beta-crown:
    enable: false  # Disable for speed

bab:
  max_domains: 1000  # Reduce from default
  branching:
    candidates: 3  # Reduce candidates

errors.cause: Model or batch too large for GPU memory

solutions.code:
solver:
  batch_size: 16  # Reduce from 64
  alpha-crown:
    batch_size: 16

solver:
  device: cuda
  bab:
    cut:
      cplex_cuts: true  # Offload to CPU

solver:
  device: cpu
  batch_size: 1
git clone https://github.com/stanleybak/vnncomp2023_benchmarks
python complete_verifier/abcrown.py --config configs/vnncomp/benchmark.yaml

# VNN-COMP format:
# instances.csv: model_path, spec_path, timeout
# Each line is one verification instance

bab:
  branching:
    method: kfsb  # or naive, fsb, kfsb, sb

bab:
  branching:
    input_split:
      enable: true
      adv_check: 1

# safe: Property VERIFIED
# Network provably satisfies specification

# unsafe: Counterexample FOUND
# Network violates specification
# Check adversarial_example in output

# unknown: Verification INCOMPLETE
# Try: more time, different settings, simpler property
